requirement.title: Successful User Login
requirement.description: As a registered user of the healthcare portal, I want to log in with my email and password, so that I can access my personal health record.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given the user is on the login page
When the user enters a valid email and password
Then the user should be redirected to their dashboard

requirement.title: Failed User Login

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given the user is on the login page
When the user enters an invalid email or password
Then an 'Invalid credentials' error message should be displayed
